comment:
Nose : Sherry bomb, creamy vanilla, strawberry, raspberry, oak

Palate : Black Cherry, oak, tons of sherry, dry red wines, dark red fruits, prunes and dried fruits

Finish: clean with lingering plum and dried fruits

#7404 제주도꺼

풍미, 깊은 단맛, 은은하면서 뚜렷한 스파이시와 긴 피니쉬
Definition of sherry bomb. Wonderful taste, like a fine fine wine.
